segments.text: I see the water from the sink just gushing onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's creating such a large puddle, and the woman doesn't even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long the sink has been overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets are getting soaked, and the water is spreading everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the dishes on the counter, neatly stacked and waiting to be dried.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman seems so focused on her task, completely oblivious to the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she might be in her own world, not paying attention to anything else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so serene compared to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone notices the water soon before it causes more damage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how calm everything seems despite the overflowing sink.
segments.speaker: PAR
